resources:
SPEECH <--> Starting custom routine. Beep boop. I will start my patrol. I will wait here for int seconds <--> seconds. Please, take a moment to wash your hands.
Excuse me
Pardon
Beep beep coming through
On my way
I love you
TEXT <--> Take a moment to clean your hands
Waiting... Turn ON Patrol Auto-Start Turn OFF Patrol Auto-Start I am charging: %% I will start patrolling again automatically when I am fully charged. I am charging: %% You\'ll need to manually activate my patrol function again when I am fully charged.
Returning to Home Base I am going back to the home base to charge.
